title: GTA Publisher Has 62 Games In Development - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.04.21
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/games to get Honey for free!

Go to http://american-giant.com and use code KFGD to get 20% off!

Go to http://creditkarma.com/loanoffers to find the loan for you!

Tim and Tam take on a big news day where superhero games take multiple Ls, Nintendo gets big Ws, and Take-Two says it has a lot of games in development.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:15 - Housekeeping
Extra Life is going down THIS SATURDAY from 11am to 11pm. That’s gonna be a bunch of games like Mario Party and Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, which I will be there for. There’s also going to be a bunch of shenanigans like Nick & Andy taking the SATs and Blessing drinking too much whisky, and MORE. That’s going down right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames but you can donate and join the team right now by going to KindaFunny.com/ExtraLife. The goal is to raise $100,000 for Children’s Miracle Network hospitals. It’s a good cause so come out, support, and let’s have a good time.
A new episode of Gamescast is up right now. Imran returns for an episode to talk with us for our reviews of Riders Republic and Mario Party Superstars and a preview of Shin Megami Tensei V. That’s up on Youtube.com/Kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
00:08:30 -Forza Horizon 5 reviews are out, Avengers Roadmap Revealed
00:11:02 - Marvel's Midnight Suns Delayed -- Eddie Makuch, GameSpot
00:14:00 - Animal Crossing: New Horizons Major New Update Has Dropped Early -- Hayley Williams, GameSpot
00:18:50 - Nintendo Switch Has Now Sold 92.87 Million Units, And It's Catching The Wii -- Ryan Craddock, Nintendo Life
00:27:34 - Square Enix claims Crystal Dynamics was the wrong fit for ‘disappointing’ Marvel’s Avengers -- Tom Ivan, VGC
00:36:55 - GTA Parent Company Has 62 Games Coming By March 2024 -- Eddie Makuch, GameSpot
00:44:00 - Take-Two Cancels An Unannounced Game, Said To Be New Superhero Title From Mafia 3 Dev -- Eddie Makuch, GameSpot
00:48:20 - Out today
00:56:20 - Tam thoughts on Elden Ring - luciddre4m
00:58:50 - Squad Up: probablyoliver (Xbox) - oliverprob
00:59:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Janet

Follow The Games Daily Team On Twitter:
Tamoor Hussain: https://twitter.com/TamoorH
Tim Gettys: https://twitter.com/TimGettys
Kevin Coello: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin
